mapper.select: select d.dict_id, d.dict_type_id, d.dict_value, d.dict_order, d.dict_status, dt.dict_type_code from t_dictionary d left join t_dictionary_type dt on d.dict_type_id = dt.dict_type_id where d.dict_status = 1 order by d.dict_order

select
from t_dictionary where dict_type_id = #{dictTypeId} order by dict_order
mapper.insert: insert into t_dictionary (dict_type_id, dict_value, dict_order, dict_status) values (#{dictTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_dictionary
dict_type_id,
dict_value,
dict_order,
dict_status,
#{dictTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dictOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dictStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update t_dictionary
dict_type_id = #{dictTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dict_value = #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_order = #{dictOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dict_status = #{dictStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
